config.lumi_lights.help.bloom_scale: 影响光源附近的泛光规模大小
config.lumi_lights.help.godrays_intensit: 太阳/月亮周围光晕效应的强度
config.lumi_lights.help.sky_mode: 在要使用的Skybox之间进行选择
config.lumi_lights.help.lumi_sky_color: Lumi 天空模式的天空颜色
config.lumi_lights.help.glint_style: 附魔闪烁风格;(原版当前尚未支持)
config.lumi_lights.help.toon_outline: 渲染 "卡通" 风格物体轮廓线
config.lumi_lights.help.antialiasing: 后滤波去除锯齿状边缘
config.lumi_lights.help.ambient_occlusio: 环境光遮蔽;SSAO 影响性能。
config.lumi_lights.help.blocklight_specu: 反射光模拟方法;来自方块光源。
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_maxim: 基于粗糙度来限制反射面上限;(水体=1, 泥土=10) 调低有利于提升性能。
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_on_ha: 允许手上的物品反射环境光
config.lumi_lights.help.cloud_rendering: 云彩渲染模式;体积云影响性能。
config.lumi_lights.help.volumetric_cloud: 尝试从体积云中去除噪点
config.lumi_lights.help.volumetric_fog: 将阴影量值应用到雾气
config.lumi_lights.help.shadow_filtering: 阴影筛选模式影响画面柔度和性能
config.lumi_lights.help.handheld_light_r: Max reach of held light source. Set to 0 to disable
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_de: True darkness in the overworld and custom;dimensions with sky light.
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_ne: True darkness in the Nether and custom;dimensions with darkened sky.
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_en: True darkness in the End and custom;dimensions without sky light.
config.lumi_lights.help.overworld_fog_us: Thicker fog near sea level in the overworld
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_far_chunks: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks
config.lumi_lights.help.underwater_fog_f: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks (underwater)
config.lumi_lights.help.multi_bounce_ref: Use temporal data to simulate;multi-bounce reflection.
config.lumi_lights.help.kaleidoskop: K a l e i d o s k o p i k    r e f l e k t i f    m e t a l i k    b l o k.
config.lumi_lights.help.tone_profile: Experimental lighting and contrast profiles that;change the overall tone of the render result.
config.lumi_lights.help.cloud_time: Whether volumetric cloud synchronizes with client;time or in-game world time.
config.lumi_lights.help.overlay_debug: Separate overlays by rendering them differently
respackopts.tooltip.LUMI.WavyWaterIntens: Set the speed and intensity of wavy water animation
